channel.title: Problems adding button
channel.description:
Hi there, I am having a few problems adding support for the report abuse feature. I have the following code in my server (paladino76's base): [code] case 751: /* * Report abuse. Packet yet to be handled. * Public chat, private chat and trade yet to be handled. */ if(buttonId == 27) p.frames.showInterface(p, 5875); break;[/code]
However, now when I press the report abuse button in my client, I get logged out of the server! Am I using the correct interface? Help would be appreciated ;)
Thanks Ollie123

item.title: Problems adding button
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

ok, would you or anyone else know how to do that? btw. rep++
[center] Don’t abuse the reputation system.[/center]

Read full topic

item.title: Problems adding button
item.dc:creator: @Axed Axed
item.description:
@Axed wrote:

You need to add it client sided as well, if I helped you please rep me :).

Read full topic

item.title: Problems adding button
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

Hi there, I am having a few problems adding support for the report abuse feature. I have the following code in my server (paladino76’s base):

case 751: /* * Report abuse. Packet yet to be handled. * Public chat, private chat and trade yet to be handled. */ if(buttonId == 27) p.frames.showInterface(p, 5875); break;

However, now when I press the report abuse button in my client, I get logged out of the server! Am I using the correct interface? Help would be appreciated

Thanks
Ollie123
